name: Guidance
description: Target gains +1d4 to one ability check of its choice before the roll.

name: Detect Magic
description: Sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you. You can see a faint aura around magical items.
classes: Bard, Cleric, Druid, Paladin, Ranger, Sorcerer, Wizard, Artificer

name: Detect Evil and Good
description: Detect aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, or undead within 30 feet.

name: Detect Thoughts
description: Read surface thoughts of a creature and probe deeper with a save.

name: See Invisibility
description: See invisible creatures and objects as if they were visible.

name: Clairvoyance
description: Create an invisible sensor to hear or see a location within 1 mile that youâ€™ve seen or can describe.

name: Tongues
description: The creature touched can understand and speak any spoken language.

name: Arcane Eye
description: Create an invisible, magical eye that you can move and see through.

name: Legend Lore
description: Learn lore about a person, place, or object of legendary importance.

name: True Seeing
description: Grants true sight out to 120 feet, seeing through illusions and invisibility.

name: Foresight
description: The target can't be surprised, has advantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws. Other creatures have disadvantage to hit it.
